meanings.definition: A person who settles in a new country or area.
meanings.sent1: The settlers built their homes in the new land.
meanings.sent2: The settlers arrived on the ship to start a new life.
meanings.sent3: The settlers had a picnic to celebrate their new home.
meanings.sent4: The settlers' determination was as strong as the oak trees they planted.
meanings.sent5: The settlers' children played happily in the fields.

meanings.definition: A group of people who settle in a new country or area.
meanings.sent1: Many settlers traveled together to find a better future.
meanings.sent2: The settlers formed a community in the untouched wilderness.
meanings.sent3: The settlers organized a festival to welcome newcomers.
meanings.sent4: The settlers' unity was a shield against any hardship.
meanings.sent5: The settlers' laughter echoed through the valley.

meanings.definition: The act of settling in a new country or area.
meanings.sent1: The settlers' establishment of farms changed the landscape.
meanings.sent2: The settlers' adaptation to the climate was impressive.
meanings.sent3: The settlers' negotiation with the locals was filled with humor.
meanings.sent4: The settlers' integration into the community was seamless.
meanings.sent5: The settlers' determination to thrive was evident in every action.
